body: It would be nicer to be able to pass multiple arguments into the call, as you can do to `_appendData` in THD. The only downside is that it instantiates a new template for each configuration of arguments, but it's more readable.
body_html: It would be nicer to be able to pass multiple arguments into the call, as you can do to _appendData in THD. The only downside is that it instantiates a new template for each configuration of arguments, but it's more readable.
